{{Infobox Mobile general-purpose computer (non-PC) |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Handheld Video Game System |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.nintendo.com/3ds/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none -->
|brand = Nintendo |model = 3DS |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = (CTR-001) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 06/03/2018 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Nintendo 3DS (CTR-001) |wlclass = G54 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = portable game console |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = EW4DWMW028, MCLJ27H023 |icid = 4250A-DWMW028 |us_id = <!-- us id number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Nintendo;CPU CTR;1048 0H, ARM11 MPCore; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64, --> |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 268 |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Toshiba;THGBM2G3P1FBAI8; |flash1size = 1 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Fujitsu;MB82M8080-07L; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = Nintendo 3DS System Firmware;;;
|exp_if_types = SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = BAT |pwr_vdc = 4.6 |pwr_amp_dc = 0.9 |pwr_bat = 3.7 |pwr_bat_type = Li-Ion |pwr_bat_mAh = 1300 |pwr_bat_cells = 1 |pwr_conn = <!-- Connector Type --> |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = IrDA, SD Card slot, Speaker, Microphone, |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bg |category = portable game console
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Foxconn |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 04/30/2010 |estreldate = 02/26/2011 |estprice = 250 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|rad1mod = Mitsumi DWM-W028 |rad1modif = SDIO |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR6014G;AR6014G-AL1C; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *{{WPLink|Nintendo 3DS}} {{See also|Nintendo FTR-001|Foxconn J27H023}}
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/Nintendo-3DS-Teardown/5029/ ''Teardown'' on '''iFixit'''] *[https://3dbrew.org/wiki/Hardware ''Hardware'' on '''3Dbrew''' wiki] :CPU: ARM11 MPCore @268MHz, ARM9 @134MHz, :GPU: ''DMP'' PICA200 @268MHz :Flash: Toshiba THGBM2G3P1FBAI8 1GB :RAM: ''Fujitsu'' MB82M8080-07L 128MB (2x 64MB) :Wi-Fi: [[Atheros]] AR6014G-AL1C (Mitsumi DWM-W028) :Audio: [[Texas Instruments]] AIC3010B (Codec IC) :Gyroscope: Invensense ITG-3270 MEMS :Accelerometer: [[STMicro]] LIS331DH
==See also== *[[Nintendo 3DS New (CTR-002)]] *[[Nintendo 3DS XL New (SPR-002)]] • [https://ifixit.org/blog/7028/nintendo-3ds-xl/ Teardown] <!-- 2015 • [https://www.slashgear.com/nintendo-3ds-xl-2015-teardown-inside-the-tiny-computer-13368984/ Teardown] • Nintendo 1446 17 CPU LGR A (CPU ARM core) • Samsung KLM4G1YEMD-B031 4GB - NAND Flash • Fujitsu 82MK9A9A 7LFCRAM 1445 962 - FCRAM • Atheros AR6014G-AL1C - Wi-Fi SoC • Texas Instruments 93045A4 49AF3NW G2 (Power Management IC) • Renesas Electronics UC KTR 442KM13 TK14 - MCU • Texas Instruments AIC3010D 48C01JW (Codec IC) • NXP S750 1603 TSD438C - Infrared IC • Texas Instruments PH416A - I/O Expander --> *[[Nintendo 3DS (CTR-001)]] *[[Nintendo 3DS XL (SPR-001)]] <!-- 2015 ?? • Nintendo 1446 17 CPU LGR A - ARM Core • Samsung KLM4G1YEMD-B031 4GB - NAND Flash • Fujitsu 82MK9A9A 7LFCRAM 1445 962 - FCRAM • Atheros AR6014G-AL1C - Wi-Fi SOC • NXP S750 1603 TSD438C - Infrared IC --> *'''[[Nintendo 2DS (FTR-001)]]''' *[[Nintendo N3DS (KTR-001)]] *[[Nintendo N3DS XL (RED-001)]] *[[Nintendo N2DS XL (JAN-001)]]
